title: Fail2ban Management
subtitle: Manage automatic IP banning settings for all hosts

info.title: About Fail2ban
info.description: Fail2ban automatically blocks IP addresses that have too many failed login attempts (401/403 errors). Configure settings per host to protect against brute force attacks.

settings.maxRetriesHelp: Number of failed attempts before ban
settings.failCodesHelp: HTTP status codes that count as failures
